translations: adj.[数] 多面的；[数] 多面体的

sentences.sentence: Whether you're a beginner or an experienced roller of the polyhedrals, the insights in this book will improve your Game Mastering faster than you can say, "roll for initiative!"
sentences.translation: 无论你是初学者还是有经验的多面辊，在这本书的见解将改善您的游戏掌握速度比你可以说，“滚！”
